article:
My dream home is very big and clean. It is near the _ . I can watch the sea and play volleyball on the beach.
My grandparents live _ us in the big house. _ room is _ the first floor. I always chat with them and help them do some housework at the weekend. On the _ floor, there is a kitchen and a dining room. All the family _ will have dinner there. My bedroom, study and bathroom are on the third floor. There is a big balcony in my bedroom. I can play games, read books and chat _ my friends there. The furniture  in my house is all made of wood. It is good _ my health. I like _ to music while reading books in my bedroom. I always ask my friends to come here. My parents' room is on the fourth floor. It's _ very big and clean.
There is a big and nice garden behind the big house. There are many flowers and a few tall trees in it. In summer, I can sit under the trees with my family. Behind the garden, there is a swimming pool. I can _ freely in it. I think it is very comfortable to live in my dream home.
